SA20srabhusu:4446: samāpattiprabhedena upapattiprabhedena parihāṇi prabhedenā varaṇaprabhedena ca //
SA20srabhusu:4463: iha rāgacaritaḥ pudgalaḥ parītte sarvanihīne raṃjanīye vastuni ghanamadhimātraṃ rāgaparyavasthānamutpādayati /
SA20srabhusu:4483: smitapūrvaṃgama ityevaṃbhāgīyāni rāgacāritasya pudgalasya liṃgāni veditavyāni /
SA20srabhusu:4497: karkaśendriyaḥ paruṣendriyaśca bhavatyatyarthaṃ pareṣāṃ viheṭhanajātīyo bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:4525: dṛḍhaṃ ca kālaṃ tasya mohaparyavasthānasya santatimavasthāpayati /
SA20srabhusu:4549: parahāyaḥ parapraṇeya ityevaṃ bhāgīyāni mohacaritasya pudgalasya liṃgāni veditavyāni //
SA20srabhusu:4551: iha mānacaritaḥ pudgalo mānasthānīye vastuni parīttepi ghanaṃ mānaparyavasthānamutpādayati /
SA20srabhusu:4556: ] iha mānacaritaḥ pudgalaḥ mānasthānīye vastuni parīttepighanaṃ mānaparyavasthānamutpādayati kaḥ punarvādo madhyādhimātre /
SA20srabhusu:4560: uddhatendriyaśca bhavatyunnatendriyaśco[nnatendriyaśca] kāyamaṇḍanānuyuktaśca bhavatyadhimātramunnatāñca vācaṃ bhāṣate,
SA20srabhusu:4562: sātāpikagurusthānīyānāṃ ca na kālena kālaṃ yathārūpāmapacitiṃ kartā bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:4571: upanāhī cetyevaṃbhāgīyāni mānacaritasya pudgalasya liṃgāni veditavyāni //
SA20srabhusu:4573: iha vitarkacaritaḥ pudgalaḥ vitarka sthānīye vastuni parīttepi ghanaparyavasthānamutpādayati /
SA20srabhusu:4599: ] dakṣonalasa ityevaṃ bhāgīyāni vitarkacaritasya pudgalasya liṃgāni veditavyāni //
SA20srabhusu:4608: tatrayoyaṃ pudgalaḥ pratyekāyāṃ bodhau kṛtapraṇidhānaḥ so 'pi syātpratyekabuddhagotraḥ,
SA20srabhusu:4611: ] tatra yoyaṃ pudgalo mahāyāne kṛtapraṇidhānaḥ so 'pi syāchrāvakagotraḥ,
SA20srabhusu:4625: eṣāṃ yathoddiṣṭānāṃ yathāparikīrttitānāṃ pudgalānāṃ catasṛbhiḥ pratipadbhirniryāṇaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:4629: asti pratipatsukhā dhandhābhijñā asti pratipatsukhā kṣiprābhijñā //
SA20srabhusu:4630: tasya mṛdvindriyasya pudgalasya mauladhyānalābhino yā pratipadiyamucyate duḥkhā dhandhābhijñā /
SA20srabhusu:4631: tatra tīkṣṇendriyasya pudgalasya mauladhyānalābhino yā pratipadiyamucyate duḥkhā kṣiprābhijñā /
SA20srabhusu:4632: tatra mṛdvindriyasya pudgalasya mauladhyānalābhino yā pratipadiyamucyate sukhā dhandhābhijñā /
SA20srabhusu:4633: tatra tīkṣṇendrisya pudgalasya mauladhyānalābhino yā pratipadiyamucyate sukhā kṣiprābhijñā /
SA20srabhusu:4638: caturṇāṃ pratipannakānāṃ strota āpattiphalapratipannakasya sakṛdāgāmiphalapratipannakasya anāgāmiphalapratipannakasya,
SA20srabhusu:4650: yo dharmeṣu parapratyayavinayānusāreṇa prayuktaḥ sa dharmānusārī /
SA20srabhusu:4676: tadyathā samayavimuktasyārhataḥ yo bhavyo dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārebhyaḥ parihāṇāya,
SA20srabhusu:4678: akopyadharmakasyārhataḥ yo na bhavyo dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārebhyaḥ parihāṇāya [/
SA20srabhusu:4688: evamāvaraṇaprabhedena pudgalavyavasthānaṃ bhavatyebhistribhirbhedairyayoddiṣṭairyathoddiṣṭānāṃ pudgalānāṃ yathākramaṃ vyavasthānaṃ veditavyam //
SA20srabhusu:4707: parikalpitaṃ vopādāya jñeyavastusabhāgaṃ sa vikalpaṃ pratibimbaṃ samāhitabhūmikai rvipaśyanākārairvipaśyati /
SA20srabhusu:4730: vaṇaṃ vā, tanniśrayeṇa samāhitabhūmikaṃ manaskāraṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya,
SA20srabhusu:4733: sa tasmin samaye pratyakṣānubhāvika iti vā[dhi]mokṣaḥ pravarttate /
SA20srabhusu:4741: yena tasya jñeyasya vastunaḥ anusadṛśaṃ tad bhavati (/
SA20srabhusu:4752: ihāyaṃ yogī pratibimbānnimittamudgṛhya na punaḥ vicinoti /
SA20srabhusu:4757: api tu navākārayā cittasthityā adhyātmameva cittaṃ sthāpayati /
SA20srabhusu:4765: ] tasya tasminsamaye nirvikalpaṃ tatpratibimbaṃ ālambanaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:4772: itīmāni tasya jñeyavastusabhāgasya pratibimbasya paryāyanāmāni veditavyāni /
SA20srabhusu:4803: āśrayaparivṛtteśca pratibimbamatikramya tasminneva jñeye vastuni nirvikalpaṃ pratyakṣaṃ jñānadarśanamutpadyate /
SA20srabhusu:4847: ] iha, revata bhikṣuryogī yogācāraḥ caritamvā viśodhayitukāmaḥ,
SA20srabhusu:4863: sa bhikṣuryogī yogācārovitarkacarita eva ānāpānasmṛtau cittamupanibaghnāti /
SA20srabhusu:4884: iha revata, bhikṣuryadyadeva jñeyaṃ vastu nicettukāmo bhavati,
SA20srabhusu:4898: sa na tadeva jñeyamvastu samāhitaṃ sammukhībhūtaṃ paśyatyapi tu tatpratirūpakamasyotpadyate /
SA20srabhusu:4902: pratismṛtamātramvā yadālambanamayaṃ bhikṣuryogī yogācāraḥ samyagevālambane cittamupanibaghnāti /
SA20srabhusu:4928: bhikṣurasminnālambane cittamupanibadhnātyevaṃ cālambane cittamupanibadhnātyevamasya taccittamālambane sūpanibaddhaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:4952: cittanimittasya kovida ityanena savikalpaṃ nirvikalpaṃ ca pratibimba[ṃ] nimittaśabdenākhyātaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:4955: prāvivekyasya ca vidante rasamityanenālambane samyakprayuktasya prahāṇārāmatā bhāvanārāmatā cākhyātā /
SA20srabhusu:4957: dhyāyī nipaka[ḥ] pratismṛta ityanena śamathavipaśyanāyā bhāvanāsātatyamākhyātam //
SA20srabhusu:5075: bahirdhopādāya pratyaśubhatālambanena bahirdhā taiḥ rāgāccaturvidhā[d] rāgapratisaṃyuktādvarṇarāgasaṃsthānarāgasparśarāgopacārarāgapratisaṃyuktāccittaṃ viśodhayati /
SA20srabhusu:5084: yadā punarasthi vā śaṃkalikāmvā manasi karoti /
SA20srabhusu:5086: yadā vikṣiptakaṃ manasikaroti tadā upacārarāgāccittaṃ viśodhayati /
SA20srabhusu:5087: ataeva bhagavatā bahirdhopādāya pratyaśubhatā sā catasṛṣu śiva pathikā[su vya]vasthāpitā /
SA20srabhusu:5122: idaṃ tāvadrāgacaritasya caritaviśodhanena sālambanaṃ saṃbhavaṃ pratyetaducyate /
SA20srabhusu:5125: tadanyā tvaśubhatā tadanyasyāpi caritasya viśuddhaye / ālambanaṃ //
SA20srabhusu:5139: tatra yattāvadāha maitrīsahagatena cittenetyanena triṣu pakṣeṣu mitrapakṣe,
SA20srabhusu:5144: tatrāvairatayā hitādhyāśayaḥ sā punaravairatā dvābhyāṃ padābhyāmākhyātā(ḥ) /
SA20srabhusu:5148: vipulena mahadgatena pramāṇenetyanena mṛdumadhyādhimātrasya sukhasyopasaṃhāra ākhyātaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:5166: ] tatra yo duḥkhitaḥ sa karuṇāyā ālambanaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:5167: yaḥ sukhitaḥ sa muditāyā ālambanamiyamucyate maitrī [/
SA20srabhusu:5168: ] tatra vyāpādacaritaḥ pudgalaḥ [Śbh_Sh_210] maitrī bhāvayan sattveṣu yo vyāpādastaṃ pratanu karoti /
SA20srabhusu:5184: yadālambanaṃ manasi kurvan mohādhikaḥ pudgalo mohacaritaḥ mohaṃ prajahāti /
SA20srabhusu:5193: tatrādhyātmiko yadasminkāye adhyātmaṃ pratyātmaṃ khakkhaṭaṃ kharataramupādattaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:5218: iti vā punaranyopyevaṃbhāgīyaḥ ayamucyate [Śbh_Sh_213] bāhyaḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ //
SA20srabhusu:5252: tadyathā yadasminkāye tejo yenāyaṃ kāya ātapyate /
SA20srabhusu:5256: yasya cotsadatvāt jārito jārita iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati //
SA20srabhusu:5281: sa punaḥ santyasmin kāye ūrdhvaṃgamā vāyavaḥ,
SA20srabhusu:5302: ] bhavati ca samayaḥ yanmahān vāyuskandhaḥ samudāgataḥ vṛkṣāgrānapi pātayati /
SA20srabhusu:5327: tatra mānacaritaḥ pudgala imaṃ dhātuprabhedaṃ manasi kurvan kāye piṇḍasaṃjñāṃ vibhāvayati /
SA20srabhusu:5342: tatra śvāsaḥ yaḥ praśvāsasamanantaraṃ antarmukho vāyuḥ pravarttate /
SA20srabhusu:5344: tatrāntarāśvāso ya uparatesminnāśvāse na tāvatpraśvāsa utpadyate /
SA20srabhusu:5363: te ca yathāyogaṃ sa cetkāyasaṃnniśritā [eva] pravarteran /
SA20srabhusu:5369: te ca na yathāyogaṃ tena caturthadhyānasamāpannopapannānāṃ,
SA20srabhusu:5409: te punaḥ sphurakā vāyavo vivarddhamānā rujakā bhavanti /
SA20srabhusu:5431: tadā āśvāsa praśvāsopanibaddhayā smṛtyā ekamiti gaṇayati /
SA20srabhusu:5432: yadā āśvāse niruddhe praśvāsa utpadya nirgato bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:5434: eṣā hi gaṇanā saṃkhyā nātisaṃkṣiptā nātivistarā iyamucyate ekaikagaṇanā //
SA20srabhusu:5443: āśvāsaṃ ca praśvāsaṃ cedaṃ dvayamekatyamabhisaṃkṣipyaikamiti gaṇayati tenocyate dvayaikagaṇanā //
SA20srabhusu:5468: tatra dvayaikagaṇanayā catvāra āśvāsapraśvāsā ekaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:5476: tasya ca gaṇanāprayuktasya sa cedantarāccittaṃ vikṣipyate tadā punaḥ pratinivartyādito gaṇayitumārabhate /
SA20srabhusu:5491: āśvāsapraśvāsā anugantavyāścā[bhilakṣa]yitavyāśca sāntarāśvāsapraśvāsāḥ sapravṛttinivṛttyavasthāḥ ayamucyate gaṇanāparicayaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:5495: ] anyathā gaṇanāmantareṇa teṣāṃ styānamiddhamvā cittaṃ paryavahet,
SA20srabhusu:5498: ye tu tīkṣṇendriyāḥ paṭubuddhayaḥ teṣāṃ punargaṇanāprayogeṇa priyārohatā bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:5499: tatropadiṣṭā evaṃ gaṇanāprayogaṃ laghu laghveva pratividhyanti /
SA20srabhusu:5501: ] te punarāśvāsapraśvāsālambanāṃ smṛtimupanibadhya yatra ca pravarttante,
SA20srabhusu:5511: ye cāśvāsapraśvāsā yaścaiṣāmāśrayakāyastaṃ manasi kurvan rūpaskandhamavatarati /
SA20srabhusu:5512: yā teṣāmāśvāsapraśvāsānāṃ tadgrāhikayā smṛtyā saṃprayuktā anubhāvanā sa vedanāskandha ityavatarati /
SA20srabhusu:5514: yā cāsau smṛtiryā ca cetanā, yā ca (/
SA20srabhusu:5532: kāyaḥ punaścittaṃ ca kiṃ pratyayaṃ ca [/
SA20srabhusu:5551: sa evaṃ pratītyasamutpāde kṛtaparicayo ya ete saṃskārāḥ pratītyasamutpannāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:5578: darśanaprahātavyeṣu dharmeṣu prahīṇeṣu bhāvanāprahātavyā avaśiṣṭā bhavanti /
SA20srabhusu:5601: vimocaccittaṃ āśvasan vimocayan cittaṃ vimocayatīti māśvasimīti śikṣate /
SA20srabhusu:5616: yadā āśvāsaṃ vā praśvāsamvā ālambate tadā dīrgham āśvasimi praśvasimīti śikṣate /
SA20srabhusu:5638: api tu khalu tasyāsevanānvayādbhāva nānvayād bahulīkarānvayāt /
SA20srabhusu:5641: kṛtaparicayasya anye ca mṛdavaḥ sukhasaṃsparśāḥ pravarttante /
SA20srabhusu:5644: sa caivamānāpānasmṛtiprayogeṇa ca yuktaḥ sa cellābhī bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:5646: dvitīyasya vā yasmin samaye prītipratisaṃvedī āśvasan,
SA20srabhusu:5658: asmīti vā ayamahamasmīti vā bhaviṣyāmīti vā,
SA20srabhusu:5670: evaṃ cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī praśrabhya cittasaṃskārānāśvasimīti [Śbh_Sh_234] [āśvasan praśrabhya cittasaṃskārānāśvasimīti] śikṣate /
SA20srabhusu:5671: sa cetpunarlābhī bhavati maulānāṃ prathamadvitīyatṛtīyadhyānānāṃ sa cāvaśyamanāgamyasya prathamadhyānasāmantakasya lābhī bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:5700: yadā ca taccittamāsevanānvayād bhāvanānvayād [Śbh_Sh_235] bahulīkarānvayānnivaraṇasamudācārāya dūrī kṛtaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:5706: tasya nivaraṇebhyo vimuktacetaso mārgabhāvanāyā āntarāyikebhyaḥ anuśayā [a]vaśiṣṭā bhavanti /
SA20srabhusu:5708: ] sa teṣāṃ prahāṇāya mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti yaduta saṃskārānityatāmeva sādhu ca,
SA20srabhusu:5713: tena ca pūrvaṃ prathamadvitīyatṛtīyadhyānasanniśrayeṇānāgamyasaṃniśrayeṇa vā punaḥ śamathayogaḥ [/
SA20srabhusu:5715: vipaśyanāyāṃ yogaṃ karotyevaṃ asya taccittaṃ śamathavipaśyanāparibhāvitaṃ dhātuṣu vimucyate /
SA20srabhusu:5723: sa evaṃ trīndhātūn śāntato manasi kurvan,
SA20srabhusu:5739: yatra vitarkacaritaḥ pudgalaḥ prayujyamānaḥ priyāro hatayā prayujyate /
SA20srabhusu:5741: savyokṣepamadhyātmaṃ pratyātmaṃ [Śbh_Sh_237] āsannāsannaṃ yenāsya tatra prayujyamānasya yo vitarkasaṃkṣobhaḥ sa na bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:5761: tatra rūpaskandho yatkiṃcidrūpaṃ sarvaṃ taccatvāri mahābhūtāni /
SA20srabhusu:5797: atītānāgatapratyutpannamādhyātmikaṃ [Śbh_Sh_243] vā bāhyamvā iti vistareṇa pūrvavat //
SA20srabhusu:5805: tatra katamā nānātmakatā skandhānāmanya eva rūpaskandho [Śbh_Sh_244] 'nyo vedanāskandha evaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:5866: ] evaṃ yāvanmanaḥ samanantaraṃ tajjo manasikārodhipatipratyayo dharmālambanaṃ (dharma ālambanaṃ)
SA20srabhusu:5879: vistareṇa yāvadevamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavatyayamucyate pratītyasamutpādaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:5882: saṃskārā eva dharmāṇāmāhārakāḥ tena hetusamutpannatvāt pratītyasamutpannatvātvādabhūtvā bhavanti /
SA20srabhusu:5884: tasmādanityā ete saṃskārā ye punaranityāste jātidharmāṇo,
SA20srabhusu:5909: [Śbh_Sh_250] adhobhūmīnāmaudārikatvaṃ tadyathā kāmadhātau prathamadhyānasya evaṃ yāvannaiva saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasya /
SA20srabhusu:5914: tatra svabhāvaudārikatā kāmadhātāvapi pañca skandhāḥ saṃvidyante /
SA20srabhusu:5915: prathame tu dhyāne ye kāmāvacarāste sādīnavatarāśca duḥkhavihārata[rāś]ca /
SA20srabhusu:5919: ] tathā tena te śāntatarāḥ praṇītatarā ityucyante /
SA20srabhusu:5926: iyaṃ tūparimāsu bhūmiṣu yāvadākiṃcanyāyatanā[t]tadaudārikata[rā]śca veditavyāḥ sarvā adharimā bhūmayaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:5928: naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ punaḥ śāntameva upari śreṣṭhatayā bhūmerabhāvāt /
SA20srabhusu:5939: idaṃ laukikānāṃ laukikena mārgeṇa kleśaviśodhanamālambanaṃ tathāpi tasyādharimāṃ bhūmimādīnavataḥ paśyataḥ /
SA20srabhusu:5946: lokottareṇa vā punarmārgeṇa kleśaviśodhanamālambanaṃ caturvidhaṃ, tadyathā /
SA20srabhusu:5952: tadyathā jātirduḥkhaṃ jarāpi [duḥkhaṃ] vyādhirmaraṇamapriyasaṃyogaḥ priyavinābhāva icchāvighātaśca /
SA20srabhusu:5955: tatra samudaya āryasatyaṃ tṛṣṇā paunarbhavikī nandīrāgasahagatā tatra tatrābhinandinī //
SA20srabhusu:5956: tatra niro[dha ā]ryasatyaṃ yadasyā eva tṛṣṇāyā aśeṣaprahāṇaṃ //
SA20srabhusu:5959: tatra kṛṣṇapakṣaṃ śuklapakṣaṃ copādāya hetuphalavyavasthānena catuḥsatyavyavasthānaṃ //
SA20srabhusu:5999: ) duḥkhaṃ, duḥkhanidānaṃ punaḥ sa iti peyālam /
SA20srabhusu:6004: tathā hi paṃcopādānaskandhāstrivedanāparigatāste tathoktāyāḥ dukhaduḥkhatāyā bhājanabhūtā[ḥ /
SA20srabhusu:6008: kena punaḥ kāraṇena bhagavatā duḥkhaduḥkhataiva parikīrttitā /
SA20srabhusu:6011: ] tathā hi duḥkhaduḥkhatāyā [Śbh_Sh_256] māryāṇāṃ bālānāñca tulyā duḥkhatābuddhiḥ pravarttate /
SA20srabhusu:6012: saṃvejikātyarthaṃ duḥkhaduḥkhatā pūrvamakṛtaprajñānāmevaṃ ca deśyamāne sukhamavatāro bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:6014: tatra trividhāyā duḥkhatāyāḥ kathaṃ vyavasthānaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:6015: yattāvadduḥkhaṃ jātirduḥkhaṃ yāvadicchāvighāto duḥkhamityanena sādhiṣṭhānā duḥkhā vedanā ākhyātā //
SA20srabhusu:6018: ye vā punaretadvipakṣā dharmāstathā yauvanaṃ jarāyā,
SA20srabhusu:6024: ye ca duḥkhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ pravṛttāḥ kleśāḥ sādhiṣṭhānā,
SA20srabhusu:6025: ye cārogyādiṣu sukhasthānīyeṣu dharmeṣu tannirjātāyāṃ ca vedanāyāṃ ye pravṛttāḥ kleśā iyamucyate vipariṇāma duḥkhatā //
SA20srabhusu:6026: tatra sukhā vedanā sādhiṣṭhānā anityatayā pa[ri]ṇamantī /
SA20srabhusu:6031: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā- avatīrṇavipariṇatena cittena mātṛgrāmasya hastigrahaṇaṃ ceti vistaraḥ //
SA20srabhusu:6041: sarvatragā upādānaskandheṣu saṃkṣepata āryā ca dukhaduḥkhatā,
SA20srabhusu:6043: ca sādhiṣṭhānā sukhā vedanā tāṃ sthāpayitvā,
SA20srabhusu:6045: sahagatāstannirjātāstadutpattipratyayā stasya cotpannasya sthitibhājanā iyamucyate saṃskāraduḥkhatā //
SA20srabhusu:6056: [Śbh_Sh_258] tatra yā punarbhavaprārthanā mā paunarbhavikī tṛṣṇā /
SA20srabhusu:6060: ] tatra yā prāpteṣu viṣayeṣu saumanasyādhyavasānasahagatā nandīrāgasahagatetyucyate /
SA20srabhusu:6061: yā punaraprāpteṣu viṣayeṣu saṃyogābhilāṣasahagatā tatra tatrābhinandinītyucyate /
SA20srabhusu:6090: tataḥ paścādgaṃbhīrāṇi prathamasya vā satyasyābhisamayāya tatprathamato 'vavadate /
SA20srabhusu:6123: ] deśanā prātihāryeṇa cittacaritaṃ samanveṣya anuśāstiprātihāryeṇa yathendriyaṃ,

SA20srabhusu:6193: astyadhiprajñaṃ śikṣā yā adhicittaṃ śikṣāyā āvāhikā /

SA20srabhusu:6233: tadyathā śūnyatā [a]praṇihitamānimittemeṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ kathaṃ vyavasthānaṃ bhavati /

SA20srabhusu:6606: yamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā prahīṇā prahīṇatāṃ kleśānāṃ pratyavekṣate /
SA20srabhusu:6607: tatrālambanaṃ manasi kurvatā kati nimittāni manasi karttavyāni bhavanti /
SA20srabhusu:6641: tatra layanimittaṃ yenālambananimittena nidānanimittena cittaṃ līnatvāya paraiti /
SA20srabhusu:6649: tāni punarnimittāni yathā samāhitāyāṃ bhūmau ebhirmanaskārairālambanamadhimucyate /
SA20srabhusu:6660: tatra prabhāsvarodhimokṣo ya ālokanimitte sūdgṛhīte ālokasahagataḥ /]
SA20srabhusu:6671: tatra yo mahadgataḥ śraddhācchandasahagato mahadgatamvā ālambanamadhimucyate /
SA20srabhusu:6718: tatra prathamakarmika ekāgratāyāṃ yāvanmanaskāraṃ na prāpnoti /

SA20srabhusu:6724: lakṣaṇapratisaṃvedinaṃ manaskāraṃ sthāpayitvā tadanyeṣu ṣaṭsu manaskāreṣu prayoganiṣṭhāpanneṣu kṛtaparicayo bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:6766: paścātpura imameva kāyaṃ yathāsthitaṃ yathāpraṇihitaṃ ūrdhvaṃ pādatalādadhaḥ keśamastakātpūrṇaṃ nānāvidhasyāśuceḥ pratyavekṣate /
SA20srabhusu:6778: sā khalveṣā traiyadhvikānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ pratītyasamutpannānāṃ vipaśyanākārā pratyavekṣāparidīpitā /
SA20srabhusu:6785: niṣaṇṇo vā nipannaṃ pratyavekṣata ityanena pratyutpannena manaskāreṇātītasya jñeyasya pratyavekṣaṇā paridīpitā /

SA20srabhusu:6993: uddhataṃ cittaṃ yadati saṃpragrahādauddhatyaparyavasthitamanubaddhacittaṃ yatpragrahakāle cābhisaṃkṣepakāle copekṣā prāptaṃ [/]

SA20srabhusu:7073: anindriyasaṃgṛhītameva rūpamadhyātmamupagatamupādattaṃ rūpamālambanīkurvannadhyātmabahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharati] [/
SA20srabhusu:7079: yatsamāhitabhūmikaṃ praśrabdhisahagataṃ rūpamālambanīkarotyevamadhyātmaṃ kāye kāyānudarśī viharati /

SA20srabhusu:7107: ] ātmanaḥ anta[ḥ] kāyaṃ keśaromanakhādibhiḥ ākārairālambanīkurvannadhyātmabahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharati //

SA20srabhusu:7134: tasya yeṣāṃ ātmadṛṣṭyādikā[nāṃ] saṃkleśānāṃ sadbhāvādyeṣāṃ nānātmadṛṣṭyādikānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmasadbhāvātskandheṣvātma darśanaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:7145: yadāśritaśca sukhaduḥkha ja dharmādharmābhyāṃ saṃkliśyate vyavadā(dī)yate ca /
SA20srabhusu:7169: viśudhyate yataśca yaśca yena saṃkliśyate viśudhyate ca /
SA20srabhusu:7181: tatra yā prajñā smṛtiśca samādhisaṃgrāhikā tatsvabhāvasmṛtyupasthānaṃ /

SA20srabhusu:7191: sa evaṃ caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu kṛtaparicaya audāriko(kau)
SA20srabhusu:7196: utpannānāṃ sthitaya iti vistareṇa pūrvavadyāvaccittaṃ pragṛhṇāti /
SA20srabhusu:7206: ] tatra kuśalā dharmā ye tatprātipakṣikā dharmāduścaritaprātipakṣikā,
SA20srabhusu:7209: utpannāśca pāpakā akuśalā dharmāstatra yadā anutpannānāṃ pāpakānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmanutpādāya spṛhāmutpādayati /
SA20srabhusu:7211: sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā notpādayiṣyāmītyevaṃ chandaṃ janayati /
SA20srabhusu:7219: te punaḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmā atītavastvālambanā vā,
SA20srabhusu:7244: evamayamanutpannānāṃ pāpakānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmanutpādāyotpannānāṃ ca prahāṇāya vyāyacchata ityucyate /
SA20srabhusu:7255: santi pāpakā akuśalā dharmā ye saṃkalpavaśe (bale)
SA20srabhusu:7278: teṣāṃ pratilambhāya saṃmukhībhāvāya ca smṛti mutpādayati [/
SA20srabhusu:7283: kṛ(ya)ttu utpannānāṃ ca kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sthitaye,
SA20srabhusu:7296: utpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sthitaye asaṃmoṣāya bhāvanāparipūraye [c]chandaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7318: evaṃ vistareṇa yāvadutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sthitaye /

SA20srabhusu:7340: anutpannaṃ ca yattadasamudācārataḥ prahīṇamevaṃ tadasaṃmukhībhāvataḥ prahātavyamiti kṛtvā /

SA20srabhusu:7360: evamanutpannāḥ kuśalā dharmā anurakṣitā bhavantyayaṃ tāvatsamyakprahāṇānāṃ vistaravibhāgaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7375: prāptavyasya vastunaḥ prāptaye pūrvameva spṛhājātena bhavitavyaṃ,
SA20srabhusu:7379: paryavasthānaprahāṇānuśayaprahāṇāya ca ye prātipakṣikā dharmāḥ kuśalāste samudānayitavyāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7380: taccaitatsarvaṃ caturbhiḥ samyakprahāṇaiḥ paridīpitaṃ bhavatyayaṃ samāsārthaḥ //
SA20srabhusu:7388: madhipatiṃ kṛtvā yaḥ pratilabhyate samādhirayaṃ chandasamādhiḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7414: tatrālambane vicaratyantasya vālambanasya svabhāvato nidānataḥ pratipakṣataśca /
SA20srabhusu:7433: tadbahulavihāriṇo yā utpadyante cittasyaikāgratāḥ vistareṇa yāvadayaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:7442: samādhipramukheṣu dharmeṣvanutpanneṣu te pāpakā akuśalā dharmā dharma mudā haranti /
SA20srabhusu:7450: tadbahulavihārī ca spṛśati] cittasyaikāgratāṃ yena ca nirabhimāno bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:7454: tatpratipakṣāśca me samādhipramukhāḥ kuśalā dharmā[ś]ca pratilabdhā,
SA20srabhusu:7458: sa taṃ caturvidhaṃ samādhimadhipatiṃ kṛtvā paryavasthāneṣu dūrīkṛteṣu /
SA20srabhusu:7462: vyāyacchata iti vistareṇa caturbhiḥ samyakprahāṇaiḥ prayujyate /
SA20srabhusu:7465: samādhiparipūraye ca tadyathā- chandaḥ [Śbh_Sh_319] kadācitsamādhiṃ paripūrayiṣyāmi /
SA20srabhusu:7475: tatra smṛtiryā navākārā navākārāyāścittasthiteḥ śamathapakṣyāyāḥ saṃgrāhikā /
SA20srabhusu:7480: mānasya yaścittābhisaṃskāraḥ śamathavipaśyanānukūlaḥ kāyakarma vākkarma samutthāpayati /
SA20srabhusu:7482: ābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ prahīṇatāmanuśayānāṃ paricchinatti jānāti /
SA20srabhusu:7491: yā ca praśrabdhiryā ca smṛtiryacca saṃprajanyaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:7525: pareṣāṃ cādhigame śāstuḥ śrāvakāṇāṃ ca yo [a]bhisaṃpratyayaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7531: ye [a]pi te vīryādayaḥ teṣāmapi lokottaradharmotpattaye ādhipatyaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:7548: sahadharmeṇa kleśaparyavasthānena vā tena sā anavamṛdyetyucyate /
SA20srabhusu:7550: taiḥ sa balairbalavān sarvaṃ mārabalaṃ vijitya prayujyate /
SA20srabhusu:7566: tānyatra samyakprahāṇānyabhipretāni tāni hyatyantatāyai pāpakānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya samvarttante //
SA20srabhusu:7567: tatra smṛtīndriyaṃ caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu draṣṭavyamitīmāni [Śbh_Sh_324] catvāri smṛtyupasthānānyaviśeṣaviśeṣa viparyāsaprahāṇāya samvarttante /
SA20srabhusu:7598: yathā abhimanthana vyāyāma evaṃ pañcānāmindriyāṇāmāsevanā draṣṭavyā /

SA20srabhusu:7621: tatra yā ca praśrabdhiryaśca samārdhiyā copekṣā itīmāni trīṇi śamathapakṣyāṇi [/

SA20srabhusu:7628: ] [Śbh_Sh_327] sa teṣāṃ prahāṇāya triskandhamāryāṣṭaṃgaṃ mārgaṃ bhāvayati /
SA20srabhusu:7638: āryasya śaikṣasya dṛṣṭapadasyāyaṃ mārga iyaṃ pratipadaṣṭābhiraṃgaiḥ saṃgṛhītā(ḥ) //
SA20srabhusu:7643: pratilabhya ca yattasyaiva prajñayā vyavasthānaṃ karoti //
SA20srabhusu:7664: vihāragato vā punaḥ paryeṣiteṣu cīvarādiṣu gate,
SA20srabhusu:7673: te anena pūrvameva manaskāralābhādbodhyaṃgaireva saha labdhā bhavanti /
SA20srabhusu:7675: kena kāraṇena dīrgha kālaṃ hyetadāryāṇāṃ satāṃ samyaggatānāmiṣṭaṃ kāntaṃ priyaṃ mana āpaṃ kaccidahaṃ tadvāgduścaritasya,
SA20srabhusu:7680: kāntaṃ priyaṃ mana āpaṃ tadanena tasminsamaye pratilabdhaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:7690: iti tānyāpakāntāni śīlānyadhipatiṃ kṛtvā mārgabhāvanākāle yāvatpravartate /
SA20srabhusu:7691: yacca kāyakarma yaścājīvaḥ tepi samyagvākkarmāntājīvā ityucyante /
SA20srabhusu:7701: yaccatvāri smṛtyupasthānānyadhipatiṃ kṛtvā aviparyāyasaṃgṛhītā smṛtiḥ navākārā navākāracittasthitisaṃgrāhikā [/
SA20srabhusu:7705: tadetatsarvamabhisamasya āryāṣṭāṃgo mārgaścārakaraṇīye ca vihārakaraṇīye cāvasthitaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7712: tatra yā ca samyaksamṛtiryaśca samyaksamādhisyaṃ śamathaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7718: jñānamātrapratibaddhavastudarśanamārgaḥ jñānotpattimātreṇa kleśān prajahātyanena kāraṇena vākkarmāntājīvā bhāvanāmārge vyavasthāpitāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7719: iti ya evameṣāmanayā ānupūrvyā saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhapakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāmabhyāsaḥ, paricayaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7732: api ca pūrvotpannasya mārgasya paścādutpanno mārgaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7738: tadyathā nirvastukānāṃ kleśānāmapāyagamanahetubhūtānāṃ prahāṇātpratipakṣotpādācca srota āpattiphalaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:7745: yayā yamādita eva na prayutyata ityādita u[t]trāsikā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7751: api svābhyāsāttasya yāvad yathābhūtadarśanaṃ na bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:7756: tasyāsya srota āpannasya paraṃ sapta bhavā avaśiṣṭā bhavanti /
SA20srabhusu:7763: iha pratyāgamajanmikaṃ kleśaṃ prahāya tadā anāgāmiphalaṃ vyavasthāpyate //
SA20srabhusu:7766: tatpunaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇādrāgadveṣamohānāṃ ca /
SA20srabhusu:7779: ayaṃ tveṣāṃ viśeṣo rāgādicaritaḥ prayujyamānaścireṇādhigantā bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:7783: samabhāgacaritasya pudgalasya mandarajaskasya ca katamāni liṃgāni /
SA20srabhusu:7785: samabhāgacaritasya pudgalasya sarvāṇi tāni liṃgāni saṃvidyante /
SA20srabhusu:7789: tathā rāgādicaritānāṃ samaprāptāni [Śbh_Sh_335] bhavanti pratyayeṣu satsu na prajñāyante /
SA20srabhusu:7807: yā dṛṣṭe dharme caritaviśodhanenālambanaviśodhanena na śakyate viśodhayituṃ /
SA20srabhusu:7811: tatropapatro jāto bhavatyeḍamūko hastasaṃbādhikaḥ apratibalo bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:7819: adhimuktisaṃprayogāddhi tamāryā [a]śāṭhyatayā sucintita dharmārthasya niḥkāṃkṣanirvicikitsāprayoganiryāṇatayā yā dṛṣṭiḥ śraddhayā saṃprayuktā /
SA20srabhusu:7820: asmāddharma vinayādasaṃhāryādadhimuktyā ca saṃprayuktā buddhānāṃ buddhaśrāvakāṇāṃ ca /
SA20srabhusu:7826: vigatamāyāśāṭhyā ca yā dṛṣṭiḥ yayā ṛjuko bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:7847: tatra puṇyasabhāro yenāpyetarhi ānulomikāḥ pariṣkārāḥ prādurābhavanti /
SA20srabhusu:7886: yathoktaṃ śramaṇālaṃkāre tairayaṃ prakṛtyaiva samanvāgato bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:7887: itīmānyevaṃ bhāgīyāni mandarajaskasya pudgalasya liṃgāni veditavyāni //
SA20srabhusu:7912: darśanabhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ kleśānāṃ vijayāttatra tathāgato bodhisattvaścāyatyāṃ bodhāya pratipannāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7919: tatra ye pṛthagjanakalyāṇakā ātmahitāya pratipannā śajjinaḥ (mārgadeśikāḥ) /

SA20srabhusu:7928: tatra yoyaṃ pudgalo duḥśīlaḥ pāpadharmā yāvadabrahamacārī [brahmacārī] (ri) pratijñaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7929: ayamucyate mārgadūṣī dūṣitonena mārgo bhavati mūlata āditaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:7950: tatra saṃjñābrāhmaṇa iti loke nāma bhavati,
SA20srabhusu:7967: tatra tadantaraprahāyī yo laukikena mārgeṇa kāmavītarāgaḥ pṛthagjanaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8003: api ca pravrājayatyātmanaḥ pāpakānakuśalān dharmān sa pravrajita ityucyate /
SA20srabhusu:8019: yadvā saṃpra [.........................................] jña upāyajña[ḥ] kuśala ityarthaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8024: sa tāvadupāyajñopi sātatikopi kṛtaparicayopi nārādhako bhavati /

SA20srabhusu:8083: yasya raṃjanīyeṣu rūpeṣu sahagatvarasampraṣṭavyadharmeṣu nimittagrāhitāyāmanuvyaṃjanagrāhitāyāṃ cittaṃ praskandati /
SA20srabhusu:8085: evaṃ bhojaneṣu mātrajñasya viharataḥ praṇīteṣu raseṣu chandarāgamanunayena cittaṃ praskandati /
SA20srabhusu:8086: bhaktavaiṣamye evaṃ pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ jāgarikāyo gamananuyuktasya viharataḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8092: abhikramapratikramādiṣu śiśumudāravarṇaṃ raṃjanīyaṃ mātṛgrāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā ayoniśo nimittagrāheṇa cittaṃ praskandati /
SA20srabhusu:8127: itīmānyevaṃbhāgīyāni mārakarmāṇi veditavyāni tāni caturṇāṃ mārāṇāṃ yathāyogaṃ //
SA20srabhusu:8148: samādhiśca balavānevama [Śbh_Sh_348]syārambhaḥ saphalo bhavatyebhistribhiḥ kāraṇairviphalo bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:8176: na lābhasatkārārthamevaṃ ca punarupasaṃkramya kālenāvakāśaṃ kṛtvā,
SA20srabhusu:8184: ityevañca punarāyācitena yoginā yogajñena sa ādikarmikaḥ,
SA20srabhusu:8228: kaccitte ādipariśodhitādbrahmacaryasya bhāvanāyai śīlaṃ ca te saviśuddhaṃ,
SA20srabhusu:8229: dṛṣṭiśca ṛjvī kaccitte āryasatyānāmuddeśavibhaṃgamāramya dharmaḥ śrutaścodgṛhītaśca /
SA20srabhusu:8234: tata uttari caturṣu sthāneṣu caturbhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ samanveṣitavyaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8270: tasya tata uttarakālaṃ kathayā tāvattrīṇi samanveṣitavyāni /
SA20srabhusu:8272: citrairgamakaidhurairvacanapathaiḥsa tasyāṃ kathāyāṃ kathyamānāyāṃ sa cecchrāvakagotro bhavatyatyarthaṃ tayā kathayā prīyate /
SA20srabhusu:8276: mahāyānapratisaṃyuktāyāmvā punaḥ kathāyāṃ kathyamānāyāṃ yo mahāyānagotraḥ so 'tyarthaṃ prīyate /
SA20srabhusu:8290: sa prasadanīyāyāṃ kathāyāṃ kathyamānāyā matyarthaṃ prasīdati ramate /
SA20srabhusu:8297: nirvedhikāyāṃ kathāyāṃ kathyamānāyāṃ nirvāṇapratisaṃyuktāyāṃ nirāmiṣamu[t]trasya saṃtrāsamāpadyate /
SA20srabhusu:8317: tayā ca ceṣṭayā yathāyogaṃ gotramindriyaṃ caritaṃ ca samanveṣitavyaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:8319: yathāpi sa yogī yogajño lābhī bhavati cetaḥ paryāyajñānasya [/
SA20srabhusu:8322: [Śbh_Sh_358] etāni catvāri sthānānyebhiścaturbhiḥ kāraṇaissamanveṣya pañcasu sthāneṣu vinayate /
SA20srabhusu:8328: tatra samādhisaṃbhārarakṣopacayaḥ yāvatā śīlasamvareṇa samanvāgato bhavati / tatra
SA20srabhusu:8329: cāpramādavihārī bhavatyapapariṇāya buddhānuśiṣṭasya ca buddhānujñātasya pudgalasya,
SA20srabhusu:8338: yasya yasya saṃbhāraparigṛhītasya dharmapravibhāgasya lābhī bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:8382: [Śbh_Sh_360] punaraparaṃ ye te ānulomikā jīvitapariṣkārāścī varādayaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8390: gaṃbhīraṃ cārthapadaṃ prajñayā pratividhya suṣṭhu ca prakāśayanti /

SA20srabhusu:8407: kena kāraṇena pañca kāraṇāni samanupaśyan saṃpiṇḍitena kāyena praśrabdhirutpadyate /
SA20srabhusu:8413: tathā pare aneneryāpathena niṣaṇṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā atyarthamabhiprasīdanti buddhaiśca buddhaśrāvakaiścāyaṃ īryāpatho niṣevitaścānujñātaśca [/
SA20srabhusu:8420: tatra ṛjunā kāyena pragṛhītena styānamiddhaṃ cittaṃ na paryādāya tiṣṭhati /
SA20srabhusu:8421: niṣkuhakena citte bahirdhā vikṣepo na paryādāya tiṣṭhati /
SA20srabhusu:8428: api ca samādhinimittālambanā pratibhālambanā smṛtiḥ pratimukhe (khī) tyucyate /
SA20srabhusu:8436: tatra cittavyapakarṣaḥ yaḥ kliṣṭamavyākṛtaṃ ca manaskāraṃ ca varjayitvā /
SA20srabhusu:8437: samāhitabhūmikaṃ vā samādhisaṃbhāraprāyogikaṃ vā manaskāraṃ bhāvayati /
SA20srabhusu:8452: gurubhyastāmadhipatiṃ kṛtvā samāhitabhūmikanimittaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya tadālambanāṃ pravāhayuktāṃ smṛtimanuvarttayati /
SA20srabhusu:8465: tenālambanena satataṃ ca satkṛtya ceyaṃ pravāhayuktatā /
SA20srabhusu:8469: samādhiriti sā khalveṣā ekāgratā śamathapakṣyā vipaśyanāpakṣyā ca /
SA20srabhusu:8486_1: tasminnevālambane pravarddhanayogena prasādayogena sābhinigrahaṃ sūkṣmīkurvan abhisaṃkṣipan saṃsthāpayati /
SA20srabhusu:8496: tāmadhipatiṃ kṛtvā teṣu nimitteṣu tasya cittasya prasaraṃ na dadāti /
SA20srabhusu:8532: yā cintā [tā]madhipatiṃ kṛtvā cittamādita ālambane sthāpayati /
SA20srabhusu:8543: tatra navākārāyāṃ cittasthitau catvāro manaskārā veditavyāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8560: yaḥ punarevamadhyātmaṃ cetaḥśamathasya lābhī vipaśyanāyāṃ prayujyate /
SA20srabhusu:8561: tasyaita eva catvāro manaskārā vipaśyanāpakṣyā bhavanti //
SA20srabhusu:8580: sā khalveṣā vipaśyanā trimukhī ṣaḍvastuprabhedālambanā veditavyā(ḥ) /

SA20srabhusu:8677: ] aśubhādhipateyaṃ dharmaṃ śrutamudagṛhītamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā samāhitabhūmikena manaskāreṇaivamarthapratisaṃvedī bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:8683: ] sa evamarthapratisaṃvedī tāmaśubhatāṃ dvayorbhāvayorvyavasthāpitāṃ paśyatyadhyātmambahirdhā ca /

SA20srabhusu:8743: api ca dvau śaṃkalikāyānimittagrāhau citrakṛtāyāḥ pāṣāṇa kāṣṭhaśādakṛtāyā vā /
SA20srabhusu:8764: [Śbh_Sh_374] bahirdhā aśubhatāmākārata evaṃ bahirdhā aśubhatāyāḥ svalakṣaṇaṃ paryeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:8767_0: yathā cādhyātmaṃ bahiḥ kāyasyāśubhāvarṇanibhayā apariṇatā yāvadbahirdhā bahiḥ kāyasyāśubhā
SA20srabhusu:8767_1: varṇanibhā vipariṇatā adhyātmikayā aśubhayā varṇanibhā samānadharmatāṃ tulyadharmatāmadhimucyate /
SA20srabhusu:8768: iyamapi me śubhā varṇanibhā evaṃ dharmiṇīti /
SA20srabhusu:8769: ye 'pi kecitsattvā anayā śubhayā varṇanibhayā samanvāgatāsteṣāmapi sāśubhāyāṃ evaṃ dharmiṇī tadyatheyambāhyā //
SA20srabhusu:8774: yathābhūtamaprajānannadhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā śubhāyāṃ varṇanibhāyāṃ saṃrāgamutpādayāmi viparyāsa eva kṛṣṇapakṣasaṃgṛhītaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8790: yeyamadhyātmaṃ [a]śubhā varṇanibhā seyamvarttamānamadhvānamupādāya yā punariyaṃ bahirdhā aśubhā varṇanibhā iyamapi vartamāna (tā)
SA20srabhusu:8794: saiṣā tāvadatītamadhvānamupādāya śubhā satī tadyathā me etarhi /
SA20srabhusu:8797: sā me iyaṃ [a]śubhā varṇanibhā varttamānamadhvānamupādāyāśubhā satī /
SA20srabhusu:8801: iti hyatītānāgatapratyutpanneṣvadhvasu ayamapi me kāya evaṃbhāvī,
SA20srabhusu:8803: etāṃ ca dharmatāmanatīta ityevaṃ kālaṃ samanveṣate /

SA20srabhusu:8810: śubhamiti vā aśubhamiti vā / api ca-
SA20srabhusu:8814: tasyāsya mṛtasya kālagatasyānupūrveṇa vipariṇatā imā avasthāḥ prajñāyante /
SA20srabhusu:8815: yaduta vinīlakamitivā yāvadasthiśaṃkalikāyā vā ayamapi me kāyaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8820: yena nidānena iyaṃ tāvatkālikī śubhā varṇanibhā /
SA20srabhusu:8822: antaḥkāyaḥ punarnityaṃ nityakālamadhyātmaṃ ca bahirdhā cāśubhā evaṃ saṃvṛtiparamārthanidānataḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8829: aśubhā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā kāmarāgaprahāṇāya samvarttata ityayaṃ tāvanme āptāgamaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8848: maitryadhipateyaṃ dharmamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā hitasukhādhyāśayagatasya sarveṣu sukhopasaṃhārādhimokṣalakṣaṇā maitrītyetamarthapratisamvedyarthaṃ paryeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:8851: mitrapakṣaṃ vā adhyātmamamitrodāsīnapakṣaṃ bahirdhā evaṃ ca vastuni maitrīṃ samanveṣate /

SA20srabhusu:8863: ] evaṃ saprītikena niṣprītikena ca sukhena veditavyam /
SA20srabhusu:8891: śabdamātra[ṃ] māṣamātrametadapi ca tathā saṃbhūtoyaṃ kāyo rūpī audārikaścāturmahābhūtiko yatra me sthitasyeme evaṃ rūpāḥ sparśāḥ krāmanti /
SA20srabhusu:8894: anitya, etepi sparśā ye te apakārakāstepyanityāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8896: sarva eva sattvā jātijarāvyādhimaraṇadharmāṇaste prakṛtyaiva duḥkhitā stan me pratirūpaṃ syāt /
SA20srabhusu:8897: yadyahaṃ prakṛtiduḥkhiteṣu sattveṣu bhūyo duḥkhopasaṃhārameva kuryāṃ,
SA20srabhusu:8902: yonena dīrghasyādhvanotyayānmātā vā bhū[t] pitā vā,
SA20srabhusu:8924: yo me pāpakāriṣu sattveṣu vyāpādaḥ maraṇa eṣa dharma iti vistareṇa pūrvavat /
SA20srabhusu:8926: raṇa eṣa dharma iti vistareṇa pūrvavat /
SA20srabhusu:8930: ye tāvadatītamadhvānamupādāya sukhakāmāḥ sattvāḥ te atītāḥ,
SA20srabhusu:8938: sattvo vā ya eṣa sukhakāmo vā syāt /
SA20srabhusu:8940: api tu skandhamātrametat saṃskāramātrakametadyatraiṣā saṃjñā saṃjñaptirvyavahāraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8941: te punaḥ saṃskārāḥ karmakleśahetukā ityevamapekṣāyuktyā maitrīmparyeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:8942: prasiddhadharmatā khalveṣā [a]cintyadharmatā yanmaitrīvyāpādabhāvanā prahāṇāya samvarttata ityevaṃ dharmatāyuktyā maitrīmparyeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:8944: tatra kathamidaṃ pratyayatā pratītyasamutpādālambanā vipaśyanāprayuktārthaṃ paryeṣate /

SA20srabhusu:8946: teṣāṃ teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirodhātte te dharmā nirudhyante [/
SA20srabhusu:8958: pūrvānte ajñānamiti vistareṇa yathā pratītyasamutpādavibhaṃge evaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ paryeṣate [/
SA20srabhusu:8961: evaṃ pratītyasamutpannāḥ saṃskārāḥ sarva ete abhūtvā bhāvād,
SA20srabhusu:8966: yo (ya) eṣvanityeṣu duḥkhaśūnyānātmakeṣu saṃskāreṣu yathābhūtaṃ pratisammohaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:8974: yaḥ karttā vā pratisaṃvedako vā syānnānyatra dharmasaṃketāt /
SA20srabhusu:8975: teṣvevāvidyāpratyayeṣu [Śbh_Sh_384] saṃskāreṣu yāvajjātipratyaye jarāmaraṇe saṃjñā prajñaptirvyavahāraḥ kārako vedaka ityevaṃ nāmā,
SA20srabhusu:8999: yadbalena yatsāṃmukhyena tatkarma vipākadānadāna samarthaṃ bhavatyayamabhinirvṛttihetuḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9000: imaṃ ca dvividhaṃ hetumadhipatiṃ kṛtvā evaṃ asya trividhaḥ duḥkhatānupakṣasya kevalasyāsya duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavatīti /
SA20srabhusu:9020: iti yaḥ piṇḍasaṃjñino dhātunānātvaṃ ajānānasyā[ne]na kāyena nānādhātukena unnatirmanya (nvā)
SA20srabhusu:9021: nā maraṇa eṣa dharmaḥ kṛṣṇapakṣyaḥ viparyayācchuklapakṣya ityeva[ṃ] pakṣaṃ paryeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:9025: kāṣṭhamvā cākāśaṃ parivāritamagāro [a]gāra iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchatyevameva ṣaḍdhātūnupādāya /
SA20srabhusu:9028: śoṇitaṃ cākāśe parivārite saṃjñā prajñaptirvyavahāro bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:9033: āptāgamopyeṣa pratyātmajñānamanumānikopyeṣa vidhiḥ prasiddhadharmatācintyadharmatetyevaṃ kāryakāraṇayuktimupapattisānayuktiṃ dharmatāyuktiṃ ca paryeṣate //
SA20srabhusu:9048: ) jīvitendriyamayaṃ ca kāyaḥ savijñānaka ityanityā āśvāsapraśvāsā mahāśravaṇetyevaṃ (ṇā ityevaṃ)
SA20srabhusu:9056: nānyatra kaścidya āśvasiti praśvasiti vā asya caite āśvāsapraśvāsāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9074: ) prayogastadviparyayeṇa [Śbh_Sh_389] ca nava vidhaḥ kṛṣṇapakṣasaṃgṛhīto yoginā veditavyaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9084: anayā navavidhayā śuklapakṣasaṃgṛhītayā tvaritatvaritaṃ cittaṃ samādhīyate /
SA20srabhusu:9086: yāvatī cānena bhūmirgantavyā bhavatyanuprāptavyā tāṃ laghu laghvevāgantā bhavatyadhandhāyamānaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9095: samabhāgacaritaḥ mandarajaskaḥ punaḥ yatrālambane priyārohatā bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:9099: abhyāso 'nena kṛto bhavati yo antataḥ parītto 'pi na [Śbh_Sh_390] sarveṇa sarvamādikarmika eva bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:9100: tathā hyādikarmikasyānurūpe 'pyālambane na prayuktasya nivāraṇāni nābhīkṣṇaṃ samudācarita(ranti) /
SA20srabhusu:9111: sāmīcīkarmaṇo vā anyasyaivaṃbhāgīyasyetikaraṇaṃ yasyārthāya sa tannimnena cetasā tatpravaṇena tatprāstāreṇa (bhāreṇa)
SA20srabhusu:9116: niyamya pratisaṃlayanāya sa cedbhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsaka kṣatriyabrāhmaṇaparṣadbhiḥ sārdhaṃ samāgacchati /
SA20srabhusu:9124: bahavo me pratyayā maraṇasya- vāto vā me kupyeta,
SA20srabhusu:9131: ] manuṣyādapi me bhayamityetāni sthānāni nityakālasya [Śbh_Sh_391] na- karotyapramattaśca viharatyevaṃ ca punarapramatto vihara[ti /
SA20srabhusu:9132: ] api bata jīveyaṃ saptāhaṃ ṣaṭ pañcacatustridvire (dvaye)
SA20srabhusu:9137: yāvacca jīveyaṃ tāvadyogamanasikāreṇa śāstuḥ śāsane yogamāpadyeyaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:9138: ya i(di)yatā mayā bahukṛtyaṃ syādyaduta śāstuḥ śāsane itīyamaśithilaprayogatā /
SA20srabhusu:9164: uddhate citte ūrdhvamvābhiśaṃkini śamathasya kālo bhāvanāyai /
SA20srabhusu:9165: tathā vipaśyanāparibhāvite citte iti karaṇīyavyākṣepopahate śamathakālo bhāvanāyai /
SA20srabhusu:9168: tatrālambananimittaṃ vipaśyanānimittaṃ [śamatha]pakṣyaṃ jñeyavastusabhāgaṃ pratibimbamālambananimittaṃ yenālambanena prajñāṃ vyavacārayati /
SA20srabhusu:9169: tatra nidānanimittaṃ vipaśyanāparibhāvite cetasi uttaratra vipaśyanāpariśuddhaye cetaḥ śamathabimbayogaḥ [/]
SA20srabhusu:9170: tatra vipaśyanākālaḥ śamathaparibhāvite cetasi ādita eva cājñeyavastuyathābhūtāvabodhāya vipaśyanāyāḥ kālo bhāvanāyai /
SA20srabhusu:9173: ] tatra pragrahanimittaṃ yena ca prasadanīyenālambanena nimittena cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti /
SA20srabhusu:9174: yasya vīryārambhaḥ tadānulomikastatra pragrahakālaḥ līnaṃ cittaṃ līnatvābhiśaṃkini pragrahasya kālo bhāvanāyai /
SA20srabhusu:9205: na ca śiśumudāravarṇaṃ raṃjanīyaṃ mātṛgrāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā nimittagrāhī bhavatyanuvyaṃjanagrāhī,
SA20srabhusu:9226: tatra navākāracittasthityā vipaśyanā pūrvaṃgamayā adhyātmaṃ cittābhisaṃkṣepataḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9235: vyāpya tadālambanaṃ vibhāvanālakṣaṇaṃ vyavasthāpitamasmiṃstvarthe adhyātmaṃ nimittābhisaṃkṣepataḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9248: tathā prayukta utpannotpanneṣu sarvabāhyanimitteṣu asmṛtyamanasikāraṃ karoti /
SA20srabhusu:9279: tadyathā citrakaraścitrakarāntevāsī vā tatprathamaścitrakarmaṇi prayuktaḥ syāt /
SA20srabhusu:9280: sa ācāryasyāntikācchikṣāpūrvagamaṃ rūpakamādāya dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭavā pratirūpakaṃ karoti /
SA20srabhusu:9284: ya yathā yathā bhaṅktyā bhaṅktyā karoti /
SA20srabhusu:9285: tathā tathāsyottaraṃ rūpakaṃ pariśuddhataraṃ paryavadātataraṃ khyāti /
SA20srabhusu:9290: na janvandhasya tadrūpakapariśuddhiṃ nigacchedevamihāpi nayo veditavyaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9308: saiṣā navavidhā śuklapakṣyā śamathavipaśyanānulomā prayogatā veditavyā /
SA20srabhusu:9313: caturbhiḥ kāraṇairevaṃ samyakprayukto yogī āvaraṇe svañcittaṃ pariśodhayati /
SA20srabhusu:9323: tatra paritamanā yā naiṣkramyaprāvivekyaprayuktasya kliṣṭā utkaṇṭhā, aratiḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9345: svātmasaṃpragrahasthānīyeṣu dharmeṣvayoniśomanasikāro bahulīkāranivaraṇavitarkasaṃpragrahāṇāṃ nidānaṃ [Śbh_Sh_400] yadaśubhatāmamanasi kṛtya śubhatāṃ manasikarotyayamatrāyoniśaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9355: asminnāvaraṇe sati saṃvidyamāne caturvidhepyanadhigataṃ nādhigatāt parihīyate /
SA20srabhusu:9379: yena me etarhi vivekaprayuktasya paritamanā utpadyate [/
SA20srabhusu:9391: aparivarjanācca punarasya parivarjanīyasya ko doṣa ityata ādīnavaṃ paryeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:9392: parivarjitasya cāyatyāṃ kathamanutpādo bhavatītyataḥ pratipakṣaṃ bhāvayatyevamanenāvaraṇebhyaścittaṃ pariśodhitaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:9395: yaduta ebhireva tribhirmukhaiḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ vastūnāmekaikaśyā (syā a)
SA20srabhusu:9397: yathā ca yathā vipaśyanā samyakprayuktasya pṛthuvṛddhivaipulyatāṃ (vipulatāṃ)
SA20srabhusu:9405: yathā cittaikāgratā vivardhate tathā tathā kāyaḥ praśrabhyate,
SA20srabhusu:9407: ityetau dvau dharmāvanyonyaṃ nirvṛtāvanyonyaṃ pratibaddhoyaduta cittaikāgratā,
SA20srabhusu:9411: [Śbh_Sh_403] peyālaṃ ataścāsya yoginaḥ aśubhāprayogasyāsevanānvayāt bhāvanānvayādbahulīkārānvayāccarato vā,
SA20srabhusu:9414: yathāpi tatsubhāvitatvādaśubhāyāḥ kāmarāgasthānīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ [na] praskandati /
SA20srabhusu:9429: vyāpādasthānīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ na praskandatīti vistaraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9433: na nityasukhasattvāya dṛṣṭisahagataṃ sammohanimittaṃ mohaparyavasthānīyeṣu dharmeṣu /
SA20srabhusu:9438: ttasaṃjñā, mānaparyavasthānīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ na praskandatīti vistaraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9442: na tveva prapañcasaṃjñā vitarkaparyavasthānīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ na praskandatīti vistaraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9447: yo lābhī bhavati navākārāyāṃ [Śbh_Sh_405] cittasthitau navamasyākārasya yaduta samāhitatāyāḥ [/
SA20srabhusu:9457: yathaiva śamathamāsate [te] nocyate śamathaścāsyavipaśyanā cobhe mitrībhūte samayugamvarttete /
SA20srabhusu:9466: samyak prayogatā caiva navādhārā dvidhā matā /
SA20srabhusu:9470: ] āhādikarmikastatprathamakarmika evaṃ vyāpini lakṣaṇe vyavasthāpite ekāgratāyāmā (ā)
SA20srabhusu:9473: sa tatprathamata ekāgratāṃ prahāṇābhiratiṃ cādhigamiṣyāmīti caturbhirmanaskāraiḥ prayujyate /
SA20srabhusu:9481: saṃvejanīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ samvejayatyayaṃ cittasantāpano manaskāraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9487: yenāyaṃ manaskāreṇa kālena kālaṃ cittaṃ samvejanīyeṣu dharmeṣu saṃvejayitvā (saṃvejya)
SA20srabhusu:9490: nirvikalpakatāyāmevaṃ sthāpayatyekāgrāṃ smṛtiṃ pravarttayati yenāsya hetunā,
SA20srabhusu:9494: yena manaskāreṇa kālena kālaṃ cittena tathādhyātmaṃ saṃśayamiti (saṃśamayati)
SA20srabhusu:9495: tena punaḥ punarabhīkṣṇaṃ adhiprajñaṃ dharmavipaśyanāyāṃ yogaṃ karoti /
SA20srabhusu:9498: katamaḥ kālena kālaṃ saṃvejanīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ samvejayatyevamasya taccittaṃ taptaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:9506: vartamāne samavahite saṃmukhībhūte yoniśo manasikārānvayātsamvejanīyaṃ sthānaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:9509: abhyatīte kṣaṇe niruddhe vigate vipariṇate yoniśo manasikārānvayātsamvejanīyaṃ [Śbh_Sh_408] sthānaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:9522: sa evaṃ ratnānyanusaraṃścittamabhipramodayati lābhā me sulabdhāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9527: yasya me sabrahmacāriṇaḥ śīlavanto guṇavantaḥ peśalāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9535: lābhā me sulabdhā[ḥ] so [a]haṃ śāstari tathāgate [a]rhati samyaksaṃbuddhe,
SA20srabhusu:9559: api ca / yadanena pūrveṇāparamārabdhavīryeṇa viharatā viśeṣādhigamaḥ kṛto bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:9570: yaduta saṃvegapraharṣābhyāṃ yataścittamevaṃ kṛṣṇapakṣa vimukhaṃ ca /
SA20srabhusu:9572: abhiṣyandanīyena manaskāreṇa kālena kālamadhyātmaṃ ca pradadhāti /
SA20srabhusu:9573: yaduta cetaḥśamathena praśrabdhijanakena manaskāreṇa kālena kālaṃ dharmānvicinoti /
SA20srabhusu:9585: karmā[rā]ntevāsinā vā kālena kālaṃ yadā saṃtāpitaṃ ca bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:9589: karmā[rā]ntevāsī vā tadupamena śilpajñānena karmāntavastunā yatreṣṭā(ma)
SA20srabhusu:9591: meva yoginā yadā taccittamabhidhyādimalakaṣāye vimukhībhāvenodvejitaṃ ca bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:9594: śamathapakṣe vā vipaśyanāpakṣe vā tatra tatra sūpaśliṣṭaṃ ca bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:9609: ] sa cetsa yogaprayukta ādikarmiko rāgacarito bhavatyaśubhāvineyaḥ kathaṃ sa pañcānāṃ nimittānāmudgrahaṇāyā[va]bodhyate /
SA20srabhusu:9635: sarvaṃ dṛṣṭvā śrutvā caivaṃ cittaṃ saṃvejaya /
SA20srabhusu:9637: kṛcchra ātmabhāvapratilabdho yatremā evaṃ rūpātmamaśca (rūpā ātmanaśca)
SA20srabhusu:9645: dṛṣṭivipattirapi yato nidānaṃ sattvā dṛṣṭe ca dharme duḥkhavihāriṇo bhavanti /
SA20srabhusu:9664: kaṭukamanālāpamalabhyametatsthānaṃ tasmādetatsarvārthamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā prahāṇaratiratena me bhavitavyamapramattena,
SA20srabhusu:9665: evaṃ bahulavihāriṇo me apyevāsyānarthasyākriyā syādityevaṃ yoniśaḥ pradadhatsva,
SA20srabhusu:9675: śikṣā[ṃ] yathādharmaṃ pratikṛtyādhyāśayena ca punarakaraṇāya cittamutpāditaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:9692: sa cet punarbhavasi pūrveṇāparaṃ parīttasyāpi viśeṣādhigame prītirjanayitavyā,
SA20srabhusu:9700: sa cetpunarlābhī bhavati pūrveṇāparaṃ paracittasyāpi viśeṣādhigamasya [/
SA20srabhusu:9701: ] sa tvaṃ tamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā pareṣāṃ ca paripūrṇe viśeṣādhigame yaduta tathāgate,
SA20srabhusu:9763: niṣadya tatprathamata ekāgratāyāṃ cittāvikṣepe smṛtyupanibaddhaṃ kuru,
SA20srabhusu:9766: tatra ca te vikṣepāvikṣepaparijñāvadhānaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavatu /
SA20srabhusu:9767: yena vikṣepāvikṣepaparijñāvadhānena tathā tathā nimittavitarkopakleśeṣu vikṣepañca parijānīṣva,
SA20srabhusu:9770: tathā tathāvahito bhava yathā te ekāgratopanibaddhā,
SA20srabhusu:9771: adhyātmaṃ cetaḥśamathopanibaddhā sarvā cittasantatiścittadhārā paurvāparyeṇa [Śbh_Sh_417] nirnimittā pravarteta /
SA20srabhusu:9777: yaduta pūrvadṛṣṭamevamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā evaṃ tadālambanama[nu]smṛtyamanasikāreṇa vibhāvitaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:9792: pariharttavyamayaṃ ca te utkṣiptāsiko vadhakapuruṣaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9793: sa cettvamasmāttailapātrādekabindumapi pṛthivyāṃ nipātayiṣyasi tataste utkṣiptāsiko badhakapuruṣa ucchinnamūlaṃ śiraḥ prapātayiṣyati /
SA20srabhusu:9794_0: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ api nu sa puruṣaḥ amanasikṛtvā tailapātramamanasikṛtvā tailapātramamanasikṛtvā
SA20srabhusu:9797: tatkasya hetostathā hi tena puruṣeṇo[tkṣi]ptāsiko vadhakapuruṣaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddho dṛṣṭaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9800: ato me utkṣiptāsiko badhakapuruṣaḥ ucchinnamūlaṃ śiraḥ prapātayiṣyati /
SA20srabhusu:9803: tadeva tailapātraṃ sarvacetasā samanvāhṛtya samyageva pariharedevameva bhikṣavaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9819: cittasantatiṃ cittadhārāṃ nirmimittāṃ nirvikalpāmupaśāntāṃ vīryabalena nirantarāṃ paurvāpayeṇa pravarttayati /
SA20srabhusu:9824: evaṃ śamathamārgaprayuktasya evamupāyaparigṛhītaṃ smṛtisaṃprajanyasahagataṃ sābhirāmaṃ cittaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:9826: sa cetpunaranabhyāsamoṣānna ramate sopāyaṃ ca tadālamba tasmānnirvikalpādālambanād vyutthāya savikalpa ālambane smṛtyupanibaddhaṃ kurute /
SA20srabhusu:9827: yadeva te pūrvodgṛhītamaśubhanimittaṃ tadeva manasi kuru tatprathamato nimittamātrānusāriṇyā vipaśyanayā yaduta vinīlakamvā,
SA20srabhusu:9845: ] yathāvinīlakānāmevaṃ yāvada sthiśaṃkalikānāṃ sarvamevamadhimuktimanaskāraṃ niśritya bhūtamanaskāramavatara,
SA20srabhusu:9847: yāvantyetāni vinīlakāni mayādhimuktāni yāvadasthiśaṃkalikā ato [a]pramāṇavarāṇi me pūrvāntabhārabhya,
SA20srabhusu:9853: tāḥ sa cetkaścit saṃharet saṃhṛtāśca na vinaśyeyuḥ,
SA20srabhusu:9855: nāsti sa pṛthivīpradeśo yatra teṣāmavakāśaḥ syāt /
SA20srabhusu:9863: na caitāni vinīlakāni yāvadasthiśaṃkalikā [yā] vipaśyanāprayuktena sakṛdvipaśyitavyā[ni],
SA20srabhusu:9864: nānyatraikaṃ vinīlakamadhimucya punaścittaṃ śamayitavyaṃ tāvacca tadvinīkamadhimoktavyaḥ (vyaṃ)
SA20srabhusu:9869: śamayitavyaṃ yathā vinīlakamevaṃ yāvadasthiśaṃkalikaikā evaṃ yāvadapramāṇā anenaiva nayena veditavyā[ḥ] /
SA20srabhusu:9871: vimoktavyāstataḥ sarvapaścādapramāṇāni vinīlakānyapramāṇā yāvadasthiśaṃkalikā adhyātmaṃ cittābhisaṃkṣepeṇa vibhāvayatyanābhāsagatāyāṃ sthāpayati /
SA20srabhusu:9883: evaṃ ca te śamathavipaśyanāmārge ālokasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayataḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9884: sa ce dādita eva avispaṣṭodhivimokṣo bhaviṣyatyālambane samya[gā]bhāsaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9891: sa bhūyasyā mātrayā vispaṣṭataratāṃ pracurābhāsataratāñca gamiṣyati /
SA20srabhusu:9897: sūdgṛhītena kālamadhyātmaṃ cittaṃ saṃśayamayankālena kālaṃ dharmānvicinvanti(cinvan)
SA20srabhusu:9903: , idaṃ te bhaviṣyatyadhyātmaṃ kāyena kāyānupaśyanāyāḥ yadutātmano 'ntaḥ kāyamārabhya,
SA20srabhusu:9904: sa tvaṃ punarapi bahirdhā aśubhānimittenodgṛhītena vinīlakaṃ cādhimucyasva,
SA20srabhusu:9911: sa tvaṃ punarapyātmanaḥ antaḥkāye 'śubhatāparibhāvitena cetasāścāśubhatāparibhāvitena cetasā parakāye cāntarbahiścāśubhatāparibhāvitena cetasātmānaṃ ghri(mri)
SA20srabhusu:9918: idaṃ te bhaviṣyatyadhyātmabahirdhā kāye kāyānupaśyanāyāḥ sa[t]tvaṃ,
SA20srabhusu:9919: punarapi catvāro 'rūpiṇaḥ skandhāḥ śrutacintādhipateyena parikalpanimittagrāheṇa triṣu bhāgeṣvadhimucyasva śamathapakṣye,
SA20srabhusu:9930: ye caitarhi smṛtisaṃpramoṣāccittakṣepe satyutpadyante nimittavitarkopakleśālambanādhipateyā vedanādayaścatvāro [a]rūpiṇaḥ skandhāsteṣāmā(yā)
SA20srabhusu:9936: punarapi vipaśyanānimittamudgṛhya sanimitte saṃkalpe manaskāre sthitaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:9938: vedanādayacatvāro [a]rūpiṇaḥ skandhāsteṣāṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ navanavatāṃ niṣpurāṇatāmanyo 'nyatāṃ pūrvavadadhimucyasva /
SA20srabhusu:9942: evaṃ hi tvamaśubhāprayogamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā catvāri smṛtyupasthānānyavatīrṇo bhaviṣyasi /
SA20srabhusu:9946: sa tvamevamupasthitayā smṛtyā caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu yaṃ yameva grāmaṃ vā,
SA20srabhusu:9948: sa tvaṃ tameva grāmaṃ vā, nigamaṃ vā /

SA20srabhusu:10477: sarvaśo nāstyetadaudārikalakṣaṇamavitarkedvitīye dhyāne ityataḥ śāntaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānamasyaudārikatvasyāpagamāt /

SA20srabhusu:10488: yasyā yasyā bhūmervairāgyaṃ karttukāmo bhavatyupariṣṭācca yathāyogaṃ śāntalakṣaṇaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:10516: vyagracāriṇa ālambanādvivecya avyagracāriṇyālambane ekadharmatayā śāntaṃ prasannaṃ cittaṃ pravarttate /

SA20srabhusu:10523: tenāha samādhijaṃ īpsitāninditārthaprāpteḥ prītau vā doṣadarśanāt /

SA20srabhusu:10541: nāsti, tena tṛtīye dhyāne upekṣako viharatītyucyate /

SA20srabhusu:10602: tatrākāśādhimokṣasya varṇasaṃjñā nīlapītalohitāvadātādipratisaṃyuktatāmasātāmasātayā nirvirāgatayā ca samatikrānto bhavati /

SA20srabhusu:10636: sa tasya saṃjñādhimokṣasya bahulīkārānvayādākiṃcanyāyatanasāmantakaṃ samatikramya yāvatprayoganiṣṭhā(n)
SA20srabhusu:10649: na ca punaḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sāsya saṃjñā niruddhā bhavati /

SA20srabhusu:10656: sarvaśa ākiñcanyāyatana[ṃ] samatikramya naiva saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanamupasampadya viharatīti //

SA20srabhusu:10686_0: ya evamākiñcanyāyatanavītarāgasya śaikṣasyārhato vā vihārasaṃjñāpūrvakeṇa manaskāreṇa
SA20srabhusu:10686_1: cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirodha iyamucyate nirodhasamāpattirevaṃ ca punarasyāḥ prāptirbhavati //

SA20srabhusu:10716: ] vāyumaṇḍalake vā sa tathā [a]dhimucyamānaḥ tatra prerayatyādhimokṣikeṇaiva manaskāreṇa [/

SA20srabhusu:10840: ] dvitīye dhyāne mṛdumadhyādhimātrabhāvite yathāyogaṃ parīttānāmābhāsvarāṇāṃ ca devānāṃ sabhāgatāyāmupasaṃpadyate /

SA20srabhusu:10880: atha lokottareṇa mārgeṇa gantukāmo bhavati tasya catvāryāryasatyānyārabhya sapta manaskārā anupūrveṇotpadyante /

SA20srabhusu:10923: ityanena tāvatparyāyeṇa ityanena tāvatparyāyeṇa bhagavatā cakṣuṣmatā pratyakṣadarśinā sattvalokasyānityatā vyākhyātā /
SA20srabhusu:10927: sa samayo yaddīrghasyādhvano 'tyayādanupūrveṇa yāvatsaptānāṃ sūryāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:10929: yāvadasyāḥ khalu mahāpṛthivyāḥ sumerośca parvata rājasya /

SA20srabhusu:10991: tatra kālaparivāso nāma yeṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ rūpiṇāṃ svasthāne 'pyupanyastakānāṃ kālāntareṇa jarjarato palabhyate /
SA20srabhusu:10993: tatra paropakramo nāma yathāpi tat paro vividhāni rūpāṇi vividhaiḥ praharaṇaiḥ vividhairupakramaviśeṣaiḥ vicitrāṃ vikṛtimāpādayati /

SA20srabhusu:11009: tatra vāyuśoṣo nāma tathāpi tanmahatā vāyuskandhenārdrāḥ pṛthivīpradeśā laghu laghveva śuṣyanti /
SA20srabhusu:11011: pratyayāntarasamudgamo nāma tadyathā sukhavedanīyaṃ sparśaṃ pratītya sukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānasya sukhavedanīya(ḥ)
SA20srabhusu:11015: sparśasamudgamaḥ] aduḥkhāsukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānasyāsukhavedanīyasya vāduḥkhavedanīyasya vā sparśasya samudgamaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:11016: tathā raktasya pratighanimittasamudgamaḥ yasya samudgamādrāgaparyavasthānaṃ ca vigacchati /
SA20srabhusu:11030: ihānecā(nā)tmano [vā] pareṣāmvā dahrāvasthāmupādāya yāvajjīrṇāvasthā dṛṣṭā bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:11036: me saṃskārā[s] tathāpyeṣāṃ pratyakṣata eveyaṃ pūrvaṇāparā vikṛtirupalabhyate /
SA20srabhusu:11046: paścācca durvarṇatāṃ duśchavitāṃ rukṣatāṃ rukṣavarṇatāṃ ca /
SA20srabhusu:11048: ] dṛṣṭvā ca punareva pratyudāvarttyāpareṇa samayena tāmeva suvarṇatāṃ paryavadātatvagvarṇatāṃ ca paśyati /
SA20srabhusu:11053: yathā varṇa ukta evaṃ kṛśasthūlatayā saṃsthānaṃ veditavyaṃ sampattirvipattiśca /

SA20srabhusu:11090: ] apareṇa vā punaḥ samayena tāṃ vikṛtiṃ na paśyati /
SA20srabhusu:11101: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ pratyudāvarttya punaḥ śītakāle pūrvoktairevākāraiḥ paśyati /
SA20srabhusu:11104: me saṃskārā iti pūrvavadeva[ṃ] śītakṛtāṃ vipariṇāmānityatāṃ paryeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:11108: dṛṣṭvā ca punarasyaivaṃ bhavatyanityā [Śbh_Sh_480] bateme saṃskārā iti pūrvavat /
SA20srabhusu:11112: sukhavedanīyaṃ sparśaṃ pratītyotpannāṃ sukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:11116: ] tasya pūrvāṃ paryeṣaṇā āsāṃ vedanānāṃ navanavatāniḥpurāṇa purāṇatāmāpāyikatāṃ tāvatkālikatāmitvarapratyupāsthāyitamanyathībhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā,
SA20srabhusu:11122: samohaṃ vigatamohamanyatamānyatamena vā upakleśenopakliṣṭaṃ cittamupakliṣṭamiti parijānāti /
SA20srabhusu:11125: rvāparyeṇaibhiḥ kleśopakleśairavatīparṇavipariṇatāvipariṇatāṃcittasantatiṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ bhavatyanityā bateme saṃskārā iti /
SA20srabhusu:11159: vijñānaśūnyaṃ kalevaraṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punarasyaivaṃ bhavatīti vistareṇa pūrvavat //
SA20srabhusu:11164: ekadā vipūyakāvasthamenaṃ vistareṇa yāvasthiśaṃkalikāvasthaṃ dṛṣṭvāsyaivaṃ bhavatyanityā bata(te)
SA20srabhusu:11174: me saṃskārāstathā hyeṣāṃ paurvāparyeṇa pratyakṣata evāyamevaṃ rūpo vikāra upalabhyate /
SA20srabhusu:11176: evaṃ tāvatpratyakṣādhipateyena manaskāreṇādhyātmikasya vastunaḥ [paṃca] daśabhirākārairvipariṇāmānityatāṃ vyavacārayati /
SA20srabhusu:11179: ye 'nena pṛthivīpradeśā nābhisaṃskṛtāḥ pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭā bhavanti /
SA20srabhusu:11184: titapatitān khalu chidrānagninā vā dagdhānudakena vāpahratāṃ(hṛtān) /
SA20srabhusu:11189: ṣāṃ paurvāparyeṇāyamevaṃrūpaḥ pratyakṣo vikāro [Śbh_Sh_483] vipariṇāma upalabhyate /

SA20srabhusu:11204: sarveṇa vā sarvaṃ viśuṣkāṇi khilībhūtāni koṭarāṇi /
SA20srabhusu:11208: tathā kośasannidhīnāṃ vicitrāṇāṃ nānāprakārāṇāmekadā ācayaṃ paśyatyekadā apacayaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:11211: [Śbh_Sh_484] tathā vividhāni yānānyekadā sumaṇḍitāni svalaṃkṛtānyabhinavāni paśyatyekadā vigatālaṃkārāṇi /
SA20srabhusu:11230: ebhiraṣṭābhirvipariṇāmakāraṇaiḥ pūrvanirdiṣṭairasyādhyātmikabāhyasya vastuno yathāyogaṃ pratyakṣādhipateyena manaskāreṇaivaṃ vipariṇāmākāreṇānityatāṃ vyavacārayati /
SA20srabhusu:11231: [Śbh_Sh_485] yathānena sā vipariṇāmānityatā pratyakṣaṃ dṛṣṭā bhavatyanubhūtā,

SA20srabhusu:11240: tatra pratyakṣādhipateyaṃ manaskāraṃ niśrityānumānaṃ karotyevañca punaranumānaṃ karoti /
SA20srabhusu:11243: iti hi kṣaṇikāḥ saṃskārāsteṣu teṣu pratyayeṣu satsu tathā tathotpadyante /
SA20srabhusu:11250: ] sahaiva tena vināśakāraṇena vinaṣṭānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ yasmādvisadṛśā (śī)
SA20srabhusu:11254: tadyathā kvāthyamānāmasāmante sarveṇa sarvamparikṣayo bhavati agninirdagdhānāṃ ca lokabhājanānāṃ masirapi na [pra]jñāyate /
SA20srabhusu:11256: śiṣṭamapi na prajñāyate teṣāmapyuttarottarakaraṇaparyādānādante sarveṇa sarvamabhāvo bhavati /

SA20srabhusu:11259: sa evamānumānikamanaskāreṇa saṃskāreṇākṣaṇotpannabhagnavilīnatāyāṃ niścayaṃ pratilabhya punarapyapratyakṣaparalokāsaṃskārapravṛttāvanumānaṃ karoti //
SA20srabhusu:11280: sa cedīśvaranirmāṇahetukaṃ syāttadīśvarapratyayameva vā syādanyena vopādāneneśvaro nirmimīta /

SA20srabhusu:11291: [Śbh_Sh_488] praṇidhānamīśvaravinirmuktānyadharmahetukā tathā sarve 'pi saṃskārā dharmahetukā eva bhaviṣyanti /
SA20srabhusu:11296: tatra yā pūrva pañca [vidhā]nityatā pañcākārabhāvanānugatā uddiṣṭā,
SA20srabhusu:11305: so 'pareṇa samayena svāmibhāvamadāsabhāvaṃ vihāya pareṣāṃ dāsabhāvamupagacchati /
SA20srabhusu:11312: tatra dharmatākārānityatā [Śbh_Sh_489] yathāpi tasyā eva vipariṇāmānityatāyāḥ vināśānityatāyāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:11314: 'dhvani bhāvinyā dharmatāṃ pratividhyatyevaṃ dharmāṇa ete saṃskārā anāgate 'dhvani evaṃbhāgīyā iti /
SA20srabhusu:11319: sa evamādhyātmikabāhyānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ pañcavidhāyāmanityatāyāmebhiḥ pañcabhirākārairyathāyogaṃ manasikārabāhulyādupapattisādhanabhāvanādhipatyācca niye(rme)
SA20srabhusu:11324: iti hyeta eva saṃskārā jātidharmāṇaḥ jātiśca duḥkhā, yadā(yā)

SA20srabhusu:11349_0: saṃyojanabandhanākāramaniṣṭākāraṃ yogakṣemākāraṃ cādhipatiṃ kṛtvā tisṛṣu vedanāsu
SA20srabhusu:11389: yasya prahāṇādasya duḥkhasya prahāṇaṃ syādityebhiścaturbhirākāraissamudayasatyasya lakṣaṇaṃ pratisaṃvedayati /

SA20srabhusu:11405: ] yaḥ kleśānuśaya āśraya[ḥ] punarbhavāmabhinirvṛttaye hetustajjasya ca paryavasthānasya yathāyogaṃ veditavyaṃ [/
SA20srabhusu:11408: sa āyatyāṃ punarbhavābhinirvṛttaye hetustajjasya ca paryavasthānasya yathāyogaṃ samudayaḥ,
SA20srabhusu:11412: sāpuna[ḥ] paunarbhavikī tṛṣṇā nandīrāgasahagatāyāstṛṣṇāyāḥ [Śbh_Sh_494] prabhavo bhavati sā punarnandīrāgasahagatā tṛṣṇā prabhūtā,
SA20srabhusu:11413: tatra tatrābhinandinyāstṛṣṇāyāḥ pratyayo bhavatyevamasyānuśayagatāṃ trividhaparyavasthāgatāṃ ca tṛṣṇāmāgamyāyati[ḥ] /
SA20srabhusu:11420: samudayasatyalakṣaṇaṃ pratisaṃvedya asya samudayasatyasyāśeṣoparamannirodhaṃ nirodhata ākārayati /
SA20srabhusu:11436: sa evaṃ pratyātmikān skandhān pratyayenopaparīkṣya [Śbh_Sh_495] vyavacārayitvā (vyavacārya)
SA20srabhusu:11440: yatkiñcitsaṃskṛtaṃ sarvatra sarvaśaḥ [evaṃ tadevaṃ pratisaṃvedī manaskāraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:11443: te 'pyevaṃ dharmāṇaste 'pyevaṃ nayapatitā iti yatkiñcitsaṃskṛtaṃ sarvatra sarvaśa] evaṃ tadevaṃprakṛtikaṃ,
SA20srabhusu:11446: nairyāṇiko yastatprahāṇāya tasya yadā vipakṣokteṣu pratyātmikeṣu skandheṣu satyajñānaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:11449: sa cāyaṃ lakṣaṇapratisaṃvedī manaskāraḥ śrutacintāvyavakīrṇo veditavyaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:11450: yadā teṣu satyeṣvayaṃ yogī evaṃ samyak(g)
SA20srabhusu:11454: tadā śrutacintāmayaṃ manaskāraṃ samatikramya vyavatīrṇavarttinamekāntena bhāvanākāreṇādhimucyate /
SA20srabhusu:11457: ] sa tasyānvayā[d]dve satye adhikṛtya duḥkhasatyañca [Śbh_Sh_496] samudayasatyañca aparyantaṃ jñānaṃ pratilabhate /
SA20srabhusu:11508: ānimittamānimittataḥ paśyāmi mamaite dharmāstaddhetostatpratyayasya taccittaṃ na praskandatyā(tya)
SA20srabhusu:11512: raṃ vibandhakāra iti laghu laghveva prajñayā pratividhya,
SA20srabhusu:11519: sa utpannotpannaṃ cittaṃ nirudhyamānamanantarotpannena cittena bhajyamānaṃ paśyati /
SA20srabhusu:11525_0: tathā prayukto 'yaṃ yogī yattasyāścittasantateḥ anyonyatāṃ navanavatāmāpāyikatāṃ
SA20srabhusu:11534: ] asyā api cittasanteteryo nirodhaḥ so 'pi śāntaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:11536: sa nairyāṇika ityevamaparīkṣitamanaskāraparīkṣāyogena sūkṣmayā prajñayā na tānyāryasatyānyavatīrṇo bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:11548: sa evambibandhakaramasmimānaṃ prahāya nirvāṇe cādhyāśayaratiṃ parigṛhyayo 'sāvuttarottaraścittaparikṣayābhisaṃskāraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:11550: tasya taccittaṃ tasmin samaye niruddhamiva khyāti /
SA20srabhusu:11563: tasya tatsarvapaścimanirvikalpaṃcittaṃ yasyānantaraṃ pūrvavicāriteṣu satveṣvadhyātmamābhogaṃ karoti /
SA20srabhusu:11573: tasyotpādāt traidhātukāvacarāṇāṃ darśanaprahātavyānāṃ kleśānāṃ pakṣyaṃ dauṣṭhulyasanniśrayasanniviṣṭaṃ tatprahīyate /
SA20srabhusu:11574: tasya prahāṇāt sacetpūrvameva kāmebhyo vītarāgo bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:11585: sa bhūyassa tasya dauṣṭhulyasya pratipraśrabdheḥ srota āpanno bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:11592: tasyemāni liṃgāni catvāri jñānānyanena pratilabdhāni bhavanti /
SA20srabhusu:11622: tasya yāvallaukikebhyo 'gradharmebhya adhimokṣiko manaskāraḥ satyānyabhisamitavataḥ darśanaprahātavyeṣu kleśeṣu prahīṇeṣu prāvivekyo manaskāraḥ,
SA20srabhusu:11625: ata ūrdhvaṃ yathāpratilabdhaṃ mārgaṃ bhāvayato 'bhyasyataḥ kāmāvacarāṇāmadhimātramadhyānāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇāt sakṛdāgāmī bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:11628: ayañca viśeṣo yadviṣaye 'dharakleśasthānīyeṣu adhimātraparyavasthānīye 'pi baddhaṃ kleśaparyavasthānamutpādayatyāśu cāpanayati /
SA20srabhusu:11631: anāgāmiliṃgāni ca pūrvoktānītyeva tatra sarvo bhāvanāmārgaḥ pratyavekṣya pratyavekṣya mīmānsā(māṃsa)
SA20srabhusu:11636: yaḥ samāhitabhūmikena manaskāreṇa laukikalokottareṇaiṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ saṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāmabhyāsaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:11644: tatra ye tāvadapratilabdhā dharmāḥ kuśalā vaiśeṣikāstān pratilabhate /
SA20srabhusu:11672: tathā tathā adhobhūmikāḥ prahāṇādharmā dūrī bhavanti /
SA20srabhusu:11686: tatra lokottaramārgabhāvanā duḥkhaṃ vā duḥkhato manasikurvataḥ,
SA20srabhusu:11690: tatra madhyamārgabhāvanā yayā madhyān kleśān prajahāti /
SA20srabhusu:11693: tatra prayogamārgabhāvanā yayā prayogamārabhate kleśa prahāṇāya /
SA20srabhusu:11695: [Śbh_Sh_506] tatra vimuktimārgabhāvanā yayā samanantaraprahīṇe kleśavimuktiṃ sākṣātkaroti /
SA20srabhusu:11700: tasyaivaṃ bhāvanāprayuktasya kālena ca kālaṃ kleśānāṃ prahīṇāprahīṇatāṃ mīmānsa(māṃsa)
SA20srabhusu:11702: kālena kālaṃ saṃvejanīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ samvejayataḥ,
SA20srabhusu:11704: tasyāsya ratisaṃgrāhakasya manaskārasyāsevanānvayād bhāvanānvayādbahulīkārānvayānniravaśeṣabhāvanāprahātavyā[ḥ] kleśaprahāṇāya sarvapaścimaḥ śaikṣo vajropamaḥ samādhirutpadyate /
SA20srabhusu:11714: tasya vajropamasya samādheḥ samanantaraṃ sarvakleśapakṣyaṃ dauṣṭhulyabījasamuddhātādatyantatāyai cittamadhimucyate /
SA20srabhusu:11723: aśaikṣayā samyagdṛṣṭyā samyaksaṃkalpena yāvadaśaikṣayā samyagvimuktyā samyagjñānena [/
SA20srabhusu:11731: yaṃ yamevākāṃkṣate dharmaṃ manasi karttuṃ kuśalamarthopasaṃhitaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:11745: kta cittaḥ, suvimuktaprajñaḥ kevalo ukṣi..........cca...........li puruṣa ityucyate /
SA20srabhusu:11748: bhavati suṣṭhumanāḥ upekṣako bhavati smṛtaḥ samprajā[nā]naḥ /
SA20srabhusu:11759: samacittaśca bhavati vāsī candanakalpaḥ sendro pitryāṇāṃ devānāṃ mānyaśca pūjyaśca mārgakāśeṣadhātupratiṣṭhite ca bhavati tīrṇaḥ pāragato 'ntimādehadhārītyucyate /
SA20srabhusu:11760: pūrvakarmakleśāviddhānāṃ pañca skandhānāṃ svarasaṃ..........nānu pādānāt vā,
SA20srabhusu:11764: nānyatra yad duḥkhaṃ tanniruddhaṃ tavyupaśāntaṃ tacchītībhūtaṃ bhava iṃ gataṃ /
SA20srabhusu:11766: yaduta sarvopadhipratiniḥsarvasaṃjñākṣayo virāgo nirodho nirvāṇaṃ tasyemāni liṃgānyevaṃ bhāgīyāni veditavyāni /
SA20srabhusu:11770: prāpayituṃ mandadā tra ma brahmacaryaṃ maithunaṃ dharmaṃ pratiṣevituṃ /
SA20srabhusu:11773: tathā bhavyaḥ svayaṃ kṛtaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyetuṃ /
SA20srabhusu:11776_1: prayoganiṣṭho manaskāraḥ yaḥ punaragraphalārhattvasaṃgṛhītamanaskāro 'yaṃ prayoganiṣṭhāphalo manaskāraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:11780: mo dha ka sarveṣāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃyuktānāṃ nirdeśasthānīyānāṃ sākṣātkā[ra]sthānīyānāṃ tadyathā sarvanāmakāyapadakāyavyaṃjanakāyakāvyamanu śāstrāṇi // mātṛkā //
